Summary: Brilliant White Light in Dawn Sky, then again at Dusk
divs: sighting detailsi was up at dawn on 7\22\2012, the only stars that were still slightly visible were the 2-3 that are super-bright at night. i then noticed in the nw sky a brilliantly white, bright, glowing, large ball of light in a stationary position. i watched it for 2-3 minutes, before looking away and then losing sight of it. that evening, at dusk, i was sitting outside with my boyfriend and saw a very similar brilliantly white ball of light streak overhead. it came from the nw and was heading sw, just above the tree-line. it then dissolved and disappeared in front of my eyes. i have witnessed a flurry of activity since memorial day weekend. it had been quiet for the past 2 weeks(approx.)until yesterday. i wish i had high-quality camera equipment to set up. thanks.
